chunk: Ingredients: Water, Organic Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Organic Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil, Organic Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Organic Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Seed Oil, Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf, Rosmariunus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Organic Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Oil, Tocopherols (Non GMO and Soy Based),
book: 0088-Sally B's Skin Yummies Tamanu Luxury Facial Cleanser

chunk: Oleifera (Camellia) Seed Oil, Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf, Rosmariunus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Organic Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Oil, Tocopherols (Non GMO and Soy Based), Xanthum Gum, Organic Lecithin, Organic Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil
book: 0088-Sally B's Skin Yummies Tamanu Luxury Facial Cleanser

chunk: Directions: Wet hands and pour a small amount or product into palm. Rub hands together and create lather. Wash and rinse with warm water. If separation occurs, give product a quick shake.
